welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming town of Bozova, known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guney Anadolu Projesi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guney Anadolu Projesi Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanliurfa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanliurfa Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SFQ Airport WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Adiyaman Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Adiyaman Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
